OrderItemSummaryChange.name: OrderItemSummaryChange
OrderItemSummaryChange.description: Represents a change to an OrderItemSummary, usually a reduction in quantity due to a cancel or return. Corresponds to a change order item.

ChangeOrderItemId.description: ID of the associated change order item.

ChangeType.description: Type of change represented by the OrderItemSummaryChange.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: ISO code for the currency of the OrderSummary associated with the OrderItemSummaryChange. The default value is USD.

IsPreFulfillment.description: Indicates whether the change occurs before the OrderItemSummary has been fulfilled.

OrderItemSummaryId.description: ID of the OrderItemSummary to which the change applies.

OrderSummaryId.description: ID of the OrderSummary to which the associated OrderItemSummary belongs.

Reason.description: Reason for the change. You can customize this list.

ReasonText.description: Details about the reason for change.
